name: League Hud Revolution
tagline: An updated tool to change League Of Legends Hud, beautiful and simple!
body:
### What is League Hud Revolution?
It is a simple tool coded from scratch that allows you to change your LeagueOfLegends HUD.

### What is a HUD?
It is the "Window" around your abilities, minimap and game score. It looks like this:
![](http://i.epvpimg.com/Flsqb.png)
![](http://i.epvpimg.com/81cWe.png)

### BUGS
There are still many bugs, we are working to fix them, please be patient!
The program is 90% completed!

### Authors and Contributors
For now the only coder is the Portuguese Francisco Leal (@TheWebs).

### Wanna help?
Contact me via Skype: francisco.leal97 Requisites: minimal knowledge in C# or Pascal.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
